title: Yaron Brown
text:
Yaron Brown () is a former Israeli <a href="association%20football">football</a> player and currently acts as the general manager of <a href="Hapoel%20Be%27er%20Sheva%20F.C.">Hapoel Be'er Sheva</a>.
Playing career.
At the age of 16, Brown was promoted to <a href="Hapoel%20Petah%20Tikva%20F.C.">Hapoel Petah Tikva</a>'s first team as a backup for <a href="Yitzhak%20Vissoker">Yitzhak Vissoker</a>. He later played for <a href="Maccabi%20Netanya%20F.C.">Macacbi Netanya</a> and <a href="Maccabi%20Haifa%20F.C.">Maccabi Haifa</a>.
